mapper.select: select * from PersonX where date=( select MAX(date) as date from PersonX) order by region,id DESC

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) as nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonX where date=( select MAX(date) as date from PersonX) group by date,region

select sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) as nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonX where date=( select MAX(date) as date from PersonX) group by date
select * from PersonX where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) as nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total from PersonX where date>=#{date1} and date<=#{date2} group by region

select sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) as nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total from PersonX where date>=#{date1} and date<=#{date2}
mapper.insert: insert into PersonX( region, personalLeave, sickLeave, annualLeave, nursingLeave, bereavementLeave,date) values(#{region},#{personalLeave},#{sickLeave},#{annualLeave},#{nursingLeave},#{bereavementLeave},#{date})
